Greetings of the Day !!
Please propose the firm rate for the cargo below.
+++++++++
CARGO: ENGINEERING GOODS
QTY: 141 PKGS
GROSS WT: 513154 KG
VOL: 3191.58 CBM
5 PKGS ARE STACKABLE AS PER SHIPPER
POL: SHANGHAI
POD: VIZAG OR HALDIA
LAYCAN: 25TH AUG – 5TH SEPT
UNDER DECK ONLY
NO DETENTION CLAUSE @ BEND
CHARTERS ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR CONGESTION @ BEND
FLT HK/HK
2.5% TTL
We can share the packing list upon the request
+++++++++
Plsd to rcv yr feedback
